name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 2330 Ottawa St, Port Coquitlam, BC V3B 7Z1

featured_reviews.review_id: I ordered no onions for my daughter's cheeseburger for the happy meal. I made no adjustments to my order for my double cheeseburger, but there were none on mine either. I went up to the counter to ask for a side of onions because there were none on the burger I ordered and the STORE MANAGER Samira? said they can't do that because THEY COME WITH THE PATTY? (I know this isn't true). I said okay so you have onions? She said yes. I said okay so why can't I get a side of them and she continued to say because they come with the patty's.. makes no sense, especially if you can get them without. She even asked "how are you going to pay for them?" Like what?! I paid for my burger that was supposed to have them on there already and now I have to pay for them? But I thought I couldn't get a side of onions? So I went and finished my meal, came back and showed her the ingredients on the McDonald's site that say my burger should have come with them. I showed her my receipt that said no onions on the happy meal and mine had no modifications. I said if you can't give me onions on the side then you should have offered to remake my burger. She proceeded to say that they could remake my burger but this was after I ate. I don't know why she couldn't just give me some onions on the side. Small issue, but the terrible customer service and lies are the reason for this review. Not only that but as busy as it was, our patty's were not fresh and the fries were just above luke warm and not fresh either. Nuggets were good. I should have taken photos, but I wasn't thinking of leaving a review until after we ate. If you live in the area, 2725 Barnet Hwy, Coquitlam, BC V3E 1K9 is a much better location to visit. The store manager there is amazing.

featured_reviews.review_id: The last 2 times we stopped by our orders were all messed up. Ordered a bunch of snack wraps and all the wrong flavors so we had to throw out as we received all spicy. Didnt know until we got home to sit down to eat. Super frustrating when this continues to happen.
featured_reviews.review_text: The last 2 times we stopped by our orders were all messed up. Ordered a bunch of snack wraps and all the wrong flavors so we had to throw out as we received all spicy. Didnt know until we got home to sit down to eat. Super frustrating when this continues to happen.

featured_reviews.review_id: This is the second time we hadnt receive what we order. And this time is much worse. We ordered 4 Double hamburger with other items for snacks. And inside the burger only 1 piece of beef in all of 4 double hamburger. What a scam!!! Either supervior or staffs need to get fired. Getting what customer ordered is the basic ethic for getting paid for the job. If we get served like this twice already, I wonder how many others were treated the same.

featured_reviews.review_id: On Sept 29, 2023 around 6:20pm, I ordered only an extra large coffee,  my order # appeared on the screen above the pick up counter,  but after a minute it disappeared,  so I waited a while to see are they gonna hand me my coffee.  After a couple of minutes my order is still not received,   I decided to tell them my number is not on the screen anymore and my order have not yet received,  the employee didn't even check my order #, just told me "its coming".  So I waited for another 5 minutes and I'm done with my patience and asked a lady wearing a black uniform (I guess it was atleast a supervisor) about my situation,  again she didn't check my order # and asked me rudely "what was in your order",  at that time another employee came over and  looked at my order # and handed me my coffee 10 seconds later,  and it's not hot anymore which means it's prepared for a while already,  but no one cares about it.  Last time I visited this place I waited 15 minutes for the same thing.  This will be my last visit to this Mcdonalds. Terrible customer service,  always seeing them chatting and not focus on orders,  no wonder this place receive a lot of complaints about messing up orders. Luckily there are other Mcdonalds I can order from not far away from this one.

featured_reviews.review_id: Nice and clean Mcdonald's location every time I've been here, the washrooms and tables are clean. Never really ordered the food here, usually just stop by for an iced coffee or ice cream, but it's consistent and never had an issue.
featured_reviews.review_text: Nice and clean Mcdonald's location every time I've been here, the washrooms and tables are clean. Never really ordered the food here, usually just stop by for an iced coffee or ice cream, but it's consistent and never had an issue.

featured_reviews.review_id: Terrible customer service. Yesterday, Aug 15 2023, I went to the drive thru to order a large iced water for my grandmother who was experiencing heat exhaustion and they refused to give out water on a day that it got up to 37! They said they would not give us a cup of iced water unless we made a purchase of an item. Water is a basic human right, especially in the middle of a heat wave. They finally gave her a SMALL cup of water and refused to give any more than that. We have always been customers at this location to purchase food. The customer service has always been terrible but after yesterday we will no longer visit this location. Staff there clearly need to be trained better. Jeez having some compassion at least towards an elderly person.

featured_reviews.review_id:
This McDonald's has been a mainstay for many years, a quick coffee and lunch after braving the crowds next door at Costco.  Service, food, cleanliness, atmosphere, all were consistently McDonald's up until the last month or so.  Food quality has plummeted...had a chicken habanero today, almost inedible.  Bun was burnt and cold, chicken patty was dry and hard, lettuce smelled and tasted stale...all this after having to wait ten minutes, with only one other patron at the counter.

The most positive thing I can say about the young lady who very hurriedly handed me my tray...she was professional, if not friendly...

Last time there a  few weeks back was pretty much a carbon copy.

Not sure if this is the new McDonald's model for 2023 or if this is just the Ottawa Street store, but I cannot force myself to go back.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Good location, very convenient, close to Costco. They have drive through and lots of parking spaces.
Food is ok, but not the perfect
